Progenitores: Hossein Qoli Khan Asiye Khanum Ezzeddin Qajar
Cônjuge: Agha Baji Javanshir, Zibachehr Khanom, Taj ol-Dowleh, Maryam Khanom, Naneh Khanom Barforoush, Badr Jahan Khanom
Filho(a)(s): Abas Mirza, Dowlatshah, Aliqoli Mirza Etezado-ol-Saltaneh, Mohammad Taqi Mirza, Hasan Ali Mirza, Husayn Ali Mirza, Mohammad Vali Mirza, Soltan Ahmad Mirza Azod od-Dowleh, Soleyman Mirza Qajar, Omm Salmeh, Parviz Mirza, Saifullah Mirza, Fakhr-i Jahan Khanum, Bahman Mirza Baha al-Dowlah, Keykavous Mirza, Iraj, son of Fath-Ali Shah, Mohammad-Qoli Mirza Molk-Ara, Fathollah Mirza Sho'a 'al-Saltaneh, Hasan Ali Mirza Shudja al-Sultana, Ali-Naqi Mirza, Sheykh-Ali Mirza, Ali Mirza Zel as-Soltan, Emamverdi Mirza, Mohammad Reza Mirza, Mahmud Mirza Qajar, Ismail Mirza Qajar, Ahmad-Ali Mirza, Malek Mansur Mirza, Sayf ol-Dowleh, Mohammad-Amin Mirza, Farrokh-Siar Mirza, Owrang-Zib Mirza, Jalal al-Din Mirza, Aman-Allah Mirza, Begom Jan Khanom, Khadijeh Soltan Khanom Esmat al-Dowleh, Hosn Jahan Khanom, Zubaydeh Khanom, Sham ol-Dowleh, Morassa' Khanom, Zinat al-Dowleh, Abdollah Mirza, Gowhar Khanum, Tayghun Khanum, Ezzat Nesa Khanum, Ziaʾ al-Saltaneh
Ocupação: monarca, político, chefe militar, poeta, mecena
